EmailTemplate.name: System_Internal_DS Presents_Network Security 9AM.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: You are registered for the DS Presents: Network Security, Pivotal Style
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank You for Registering
DS Presents: Network Security, Pivotal Style
We're glad you can join us. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We are looking forward to you joining us for our internal DS Presents webinar. This series is exclusive to Pivotal employees and we request that you keep details supplied in this email confidential. An on-demand replay will be posted to the Pivotal Data Science team Socialcast channel post live session.
Event Details:
Date: Wednesday, October 9, 2013
Time: 9AM PST/ 5PM GMT Summer Time (London, GMT+1)
Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?d=663068954&t=a>
Event Number: 663 068 954
Dial In:
- US TOLL FREE: +1-855-749-4750 - US TOLL: +1-415-655-0001 - Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=107432872&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 663 068 954
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:ajimenez@gopivotal.com>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
Follow Us: Twitter <http://www.twitter.com/gopivotal> | LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> | Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/gopivotal> | Google+ <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490>
